alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 4:43AM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the valley, and 6 to 12 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Star Valley and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Tuesday. There will likely be a lull in the steady snowfall between midnight and 6 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult especially over Salt River Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility around a tenth of a mile in heaver snow could result in snowmobilers becoming disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley
